channel.title: Language on Raph's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Language on Raph's Blog

item.title: Do you know what I mean?
item.description:
I’ve written previously about some language that I’m actively trying to change in my day-to-day dealings with people, I write these blog posts because they hold me public accountable to my peers, friends, and family. My previous posts were: It Depends I Don’t Know
Shrugging. Source: Wikimedia Commons Today, I want to highlight some of the other phrases I’ll be trying to actively avoid in my dad-to-day speech. These are:
